B

beats - Variable in enum MOVE
informs which moves loose to the current one
bot - Variable in class ChatBotServer
This ChatBot is the chat bot that the users can interact with special commands in either of the channels.
BOT_NAME - Enum in <Unnamed>
enumerated class for the fun of the bot having multiple "personalities" to respond with
BOT_NAME(String) - Constructor for enum BOT_NAME
 
botCommands(String) - Method in class ChatBot
main functionality of the bot.
botMove() - Method in class Player_Bot
uses a randomly generated number from 1 to 5 to pick the MOVE the bot uses
botPlayer - Variable in class Game
controls the bot's game choices since the bot isn't a sentient being
